headline: Cigna Group (CI) Valuation Check After Portfolio Changes And FTC Settlement
summary: The Cigna Group (CI) is back in focus after recent portfolio moves around Shields Health Solutions, the sale of its Medicare business, and a broad Federal Trade Commission settlement tied to pharmacy benefits operations. See our latest analysis for Cigna Group. Those portfolio moves and regulatory resolutions have arrived during a mixed stretch for investors, with a 30 day share price return of 5.31% contrasting with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 4.17%. This hints at improving...

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Cigna (CI) After Recent Health Insurance Coverage Headlines?
summary: If you are wondering whether Cigna Group's share price around US$284.44 reflects good value today, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you weigh that up clearly. Over the short term the stock has been mixed, with a 0.5% decline over the last 7 days, a 5.3% gain over 30 days, and returns of 1.9% year to date, alongside a 4.2% decline over 1 year, 4.5% over 3 years, and 38.4% over 5 years. Recent news around Cigna has focused on its position as a major U.S. health insurer,...
